front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Definition of Reliability Program Plans for Nuclear Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document provides guidelines for the definition of a reliability program at nuclear generating stations and other nuclear facilities. The document emphasizes reliability programs during the operating phase of such facilities; however, the general approach applies to all phases (e.g., design, construction, start-up, operating, and decommissioning) of the facility.
